summary: This bill, the FORCE-FIT Act (H.R. 3750), mandates a pilot program within the TRICARE program to provide certain active-duty Armed Forces members with continuous glucose monitoring technology. The program aims to assess the impact of real-time metabolic health tracking on health and force readiness. The Secretary of Defense is tasked with implementing the program, providing education, and training medical professionals. The Comptroller General and the Department of Defense will issue reports evaluating the program's effectiveness and making recommendations. Covered members include those with prediabetes, type 2 diabetes (not on insulin), a history of gestational diabetes, or who are overweight or obese.
